collection.name: Animal Calls
collection.description: Michael Darby is the world's foremost expert in nonhuman vocalization, and has spent his life learning the intricacies of more than 4,000 animal calls.

collection.description: When the humans leave, ordinary objects come to life as if by magic. They drink, swear, and have sex, also as if by magic.

collection.description: Our own flavor of trending Internet stuff.

collection.name: On Cinema
collection.description: Tim Heidecker and his guest Gregg Turkington discuss what movies you should see this weekend and what movies you can wait to see on video or even not even see.

collection.name: Paynt Boyz
collection.description: Four would-be street artists get together to start a crew that will dominate the five boroughs! Or not. Paynt Boyz. Represent.

collection.name: Porn Foley
collection.description: The definitive documentary on Horst Pell, the adult film industry's undisputed master of Foley artistry.

collection.name: Stock Footage Commentary
collection.description: The creative team at Stock Dump Studios talks about how they made some of their most popular stock footage.

collection.name: Superego
collection.description: An animated series created by the team at Superego: voices improvised by Mark McConville, Matt Gourley, and Rob Delaney. Animation by Dan Hartshorn.

collection.name: Tech Scoop
collection.description: Ready to see the latest in tech put through the paces in ways that lay bare the cowardice of those Stone Age boneheads at Wired and Gizmodo? Thing X giga-guru Joe Garden performs a battery of unorthodox stress-tests on the shiniest new gadgets, so you'll know exactly which devices are worthy of your undying love and hard-earned cash.

collection.name: The New Big Ball
collection.description: "America's Funnyman" Neil Hamburger hosts The New Big Ball, a game show that pits three contestants against each other in a series of ball-related competitions for a fabulous grand prize. Featuring trusty assistant (and female bodybuilder) Linda and special guest Corbin Bernsen, The New Big Ball will have you on the edge of your seat!

collection.name: The Trash Heap
collection.description: Host Kelly Hudson serves up heaping platters of entertainment garbage in each episode of Hot Trash. What movie tanked? What actress got pregnant, and whose schlong did the deed? Kelly knows!

collection.name: Think Talk
collection.description: The Think X project strives to bring the human masses only the most salient interviews with luminaries from the worlds of entertainment, technology, science, lobster-fishing and literature.

collection.name: XHow
collection.description: XHow is the Internet's premier Do-It-Yourself series, featuring only the top Xperts in their respective fields, telling you exactly what you need to know and nothing else.

collection.name: Blue Exorcist
collection.description: Watch full episodes of Blue Exorcist, only on Toonami. When Rin Okumura discovers that he's secretly the son of Satan, he dedicates his life to becoming an exorcist and learning to defeat his father. Toonami is your home for anime, action and more, and it's only on Adult Swim.
